title: Harry Potter and the Philosophers Stone: The ADigitalMan EE
description:
by AdigitalMan 
What is it about? This extends Harry Potter 1 with the deleted scenes from the DVD release to give you even more Harry Potter to enjoy. The Canadian release was used to get the ?Philosopher?s Stone? (original English title of the book) scenes through the movie instead of the American ?Sorcerer?s Stone?. 
. 


original film name: Harry Potter and the sorcerer?s stone 
new film name: Harry Potter and the Philosopher?s Stone: The ADigitalMan Extended Edition 
film studio name: Warner 
Date Original Film Was Released: 16 NOV 2001 
Date Edit Was Released: 03. Nov 07 
Original Runtime: 152 min 
New Runtime: 158 min 
Amount of time Cut/Added: 6 min added 

Cuts removed/added/extended: 

Restored Scenes: 
* Dudley in his Smeltings uniform 
* Letters in Eggs 
* Hagrid and Harry on the Underground (excellent setup to the dragon subplot) 
* Extended Potions Class (Harry giving cheek to Snape) 
* Harry, Ron and Hermione make up after the Troll incident 
* Christmas in the Great Hall (Harry dwelling on the Mirror) 
* Cramming in the Great Hall / Neville Leglocked 


DVD - Features: 

158 min. NTSC 
static menu 
Conceptual improvements/advancements of edit over original: 

More Harry Potter! 

Time needed for the edition: 5 days 
persons involved: ADigitalMan
